title: Ticket #774: VOMS verification problems cause job failures
description:
When attempting to extract the DN and VOMS attributes from an x509 proxy, the VOMS function we call tries to verify the signature on the VOMS attributes. If the verification fails, then the whole call to extract the attributes fails. This causes condor_submit to fail, and causes the gridmanager to put jobs on hold.

Failure to verify the VOMS signature doesn't mean attempts to use the proxy will fail. We should find a way to extract the information even when this error condition occurs.
